Text:
This REALLY is the best torrent if you want to burn a DVD of the film.  It gives you a VIDEO_TS file ready to burn, and includes the DVD menu, 5.1 Dolby sound, all the extra features, and optional subtitles.  Fits onto a regular size disc (DVD 5).  Superb quality!

Many thanks to NLUPPER, not only for the upload, but especially for including the menu and extras which you strip out most of the time.  I hope this is the start of a new trend...
